sourcesContent:
Add/Edit Task

Name Description Date Assign users {{ user.firstName }} {{ user.lastName }} Assign projects {{ project.name }}

Task List:

ID {{ task.id }} Name {{ task.name }} Description {{ task.description }} Date {{ task.date | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }} Done User
{{ user.firstName }} {{ user.lastName }}
Project
{{ project.name }}
Actions
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Task } from "../model/task"; import { TaskService } from '../task.service'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; import { User } from '../model/user'; import { Project } from '../model/project'; import { ProjectService } from '../project.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task', templateUrl: './task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task.component.css'] }) export class TaskComponent { tasks: Task[] = []; users: User[] = []; projects: Project[] = []; selectedTask: Task = this.emptyTask(); displayedColumns: string[] = ['id', 'name', 'description', 'date', 'done', 'users', 'projects', 'actions']; constructor(private taskService: TaskService, private userService: UserService, private projectService: ProjectService) {} ngOnInit() { this.getTasks(); this.getUsers(); this.getProjects(); } getTasks(): void { this.tasks = this.taskService.getTasks(); } getUsers(): void { this.users = this.userService.getUsers(); } getProjects(): void { this.projects = this.projectService.getProjects(); } addTask(name: string, description: string, dateString: string, assignedUsers: User[], assignedProjects: Project[]): void { name = name.trim(); description = description.trim(); if (!name || !description || !dateString) { return; } const dateParts = dateString.split('/'); const date = new Date(parseInt(dateParts[2]), parseInt(dateParts[1]) - 1, parseInt(dateParts[0])); this.taskService.addTask(name, description, date, assignedUsers, assignedProjects); this.getTasks(); } deleteTask(task: Task): void { this.tasks = this.tasks.filter(u => u !== task); this.taskService.deleteTask(task); } selectTask(task: Task): void { this.selectedTask = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(task)); // Create a deep copy of the task object } emptyTask(): Task { return { id: 0, name: '', description: '', date: new Date(), isDone: false }; } saveTask(task: Task): void { if (task.id === 0) { this.addTask(task.name, task.description, task.date, task.assignedUsers, task.assignedProjects); } else { this.updateTask(task); } this.selectedTask = this.emptyTask(); } updateTask(task: Task): void { const index = this.tasks.findIndex(t => t.id === task.id); if (index >= 0) { this.tasks[index] = task; } } }
